article_title: 'Black-ish' star Anderson, wife divorcing after 16 years
article_text: FILE - In this Sept. 19, 2015 file photo, Anthony Anderson, an Emmy nominee for Outstanding Lead Actor in a Comedy Series for "black-ish," poses at the 67th Emmy Awards Performers Nominee Reception in West Hollywood, Calif. A spokeswoman for Anderson confirmed that his wife, Alvina Anderson, has filed for divorce. The pair were married in 1999 and have two children. (Photo by Chris Pizzello/Invision/AP, File) The Associated Press

article_metadata.title: 'Black-ish' star Anderson, wife divorcing after 16 years

og.description: LOS ANGELES (AP) — The wife of "black-ish" star Anthony Anderson has filed for divorce.
og.title: Wife of Anthony Anderson, star of TV comedy 'black-ish,' files to end 16-year marriage

article_metadata.description: LOS ANGELES (AP) — The wife of "black-ish" star Anthony Anderson has filed for divorce.

article_summary:
FILE - In this Sept. 19, 2015 file photo, Anthony Anderson, an Emmy nominee for Outstanding Lead Actor in a Comedy Series for "black-ish," poses at the 67th Emmy Awards Performers Nominee Reception in West Hollywood, Calif. A spokeswoman for Anderson confirmed that his wife, Alvina Anderson, has filed for divorce.
(Photo by Chris Pizzello/Invision/AP, File) The Associated Press
The pair were married in 1999 and have two children.
